AddPodcastByRSSScreenText1: Note: Clips, playlists, and sharing are not supported for custom RSS feeds.
AddPodcastByRSSScreenText2: Use the "Request podcast link below to add a podcast with support for clips and playlists to our database.

All brandName software is provided free: Copy, inspect, change and share ‚Äî with all. All Podverse software licensed AGPLv3+.

Error Reporting subtext: Error reports are anonymous and help identify and fix bugs.

If a podcast inserts dynamic ads the cli: ‚ñ∏ Start time varies for clips with dynamic ads.
If this is a password protected feed: If this is a password protected feed, enter the username and password above before pressing the "Save".
LNPayDescriptionText1: Log into your LNPay account to connect its wallet to Podverse at
LNPayDescriptionText2: Add your LNPay Public API Key below afterwards. Find your API key by visiting
LNPayDescriptionText3:
Used to generate a Podverse specific wallet on your LNPay account, from which you can send Sats to your favourite podcasters.

A wallet ID can be entered along with the wallet admin key if you'd like to use an existing wallet.

TermsOfServiceScreenMatomoTrackingText1: Users can allow themselves to be tracked from the app. It determines popularity of content.
TermsOfServiceScreenMatomoTrackingText2: The copylefted libre software Matomo is used for tracking on Podverse servers. Identifiable data will never be shared or sold.
TermsOfServiceScreenMatomoTrackingText3: All tracking has the IP address obscured and saved as for example 192.168.xxx.xxx.
TermsOfServiceScreenMatomoTrackingText4: No session IDs or cookies are used, because tracking users across multiple visits is not OK.
TermsOfServiceScreenMatomoTrackingText5: Keep in mind popularity as gathered by Matomo may not be completely accurate.
TermsOfServiceScreenMatomoTrackingTextFD: Podverse for F-Droid contains ***no tracking***, but the Podverse website and the iOS and Android versions (optionally) do.
TermsOfServiceScreenText1: Podverse will never sell or share private user data.
TermsOfServiceScreenText2: Podverse will never advertise next to or within a podcast's content without its permission.
TermsOfServiceScreenText3: All audio and video files found on podverse.fm are stored and load from the podcaster's own public server, not Podverse.
TermsOfServiceScreenText4: All clips hosted on podverse.fm are crowd-sourced and unofficial, unless otherwise noted by the podcaster.
TermsOfServiceScreenText5: Clips load within the full episode's media file, so users always have access to the full recording.
TermsOfServiceScreenText6: Podverse has no responsibility for, but hosts funding links and content from third-party podcast feeds and sites with independent privacy policies.
TermsOfServicesScreenText7: Podverse only stores and only uses credentials for podcasts requiring authentication in the secure storage of the device.
The device does not allow Podverse to ac: Podverse is denied access the external storage for downloads.
The email may go to your Spam folder: The e-mail may be in you spam folder.
The start time must be before the end ti: Start time must be before the end time.
The start time must be greater than 0 if: Start time must be above 0 if no end time is provided.
Tip: Titling your clips: Tip: Titling your clips helps searchability and organization.

You should receive an email shortly The: You should receive an e-mail shortly. It may be in your spam.

Your free trial expires: Your free trial Podverse period period will end

error_boundary_description: Pardon this interruption. Feel free to listen on.
sync your queue on all devices: sync queue to all your devices
sync your subscriptions on all devices: sync subscriptions to all your devices
trackingTermsText2: Popularity rankings on Podverse are sorted by unique listeners of content.
trackingTermsText3: Turn on listening tracking to get counted in these rankings.
trackingTermsText4: All tracked data is anonymized and hosted only on Podverse servers.
trackingTermsText5: Podverse will never sell or share identifiable tracking data.
value_tag_consent_checkbox_text: I have read and agree to the Terms and Conditions
value_tag_consent_text_1: Accept all following terms to use this experimental feature:
value_tag_consent_text_2: ‚Äì Podverse does not hold any responsibility for lost or corrupted funds and transactions.
value_tag_consent_text_3: ‚Äì Podverse saves LNPay account and wallet access keys in the secure storage of the device and only uses them for LNPay transactions. If a device becomes accesible to others, Podverse cannot prevent unauthorized use of your wallets.
value_tag_consent_text_4: ‚Äì Lightning Network fees are added in addition to the donation for each transaction by the Lightning Network. Podverse cannot predict the amount.
value_tag_preview_stream: Stream: Send a donation per minute listened
value_tag_preview_title: Send Bitcoin to your favorite podcasters
